verbose_text: Although the current assay did not strictly target exosome contents in CSF, trypsin and detergent were added (RIPA buffer used contains deoxycholic acid and NP40) to samples which may be enough to disrupt vesicles storing LRRK2 protein and our data show that when samples were processed without detergent, this resulted in significantly lower LRRK2 levels (XREF_FIG).
